content.title: BillionTrees Project
content.description: We're on a mission to save the trees

content.html:
A community organisation, run by local people, for local people

We aim:

  1. To develop and support projects and activities that bring local residents together, promote positive community relationships and reduce social isolation, encouraging people to get more involved in community activities, particularly those who may be less likely to participate due to age, disability, ill health and other socio-economic factors

  2. To develop and support projects and activities that bring local residents together to take care of and enhance the outdoor spaces in their area, ensuring that everyone can access and benefit from the outdoor spaces around them

  3. To empower and support local residents to develop their own ideas for projects, activities and businesses that will benefit and enhance the community
content.markdown: # A community organisation, run by local people, for local people ## We aim: 1. To develop and support projects and activities that bring local residents together, promote positive community relationships and reduce social isolation, encouraging people to get more involved in community activities, particularly those who may be less likely to participate due to age, disability, ill health and other socio-economic factors 2. To develop and support projects and activities that bring local residents together to take care of and enhance the outdoor spaces in their area, ensuring that everyone can access and benefit from the outdoor spaces around them 3. To empower and support local residents to develop their own ideas for projects, activities and businesses that will benefit and enhance the community

body.html:
We are a community organisation, run by local people, for local people. We aim to improve

the quality of life in our area, by undertaking and supporting projects, developing local links,

and empowering residents to become more involved in their community
body.markdown:
We are a community organisation, run by local people, for local people. We aim to improve

the quality of life in our area, by undertaking and supporting projects, developing local links,

and empowering residents to become more involved in their community

image.alt: Group photo from the Underground Mosaic project

body.html: Eager to get involved with community projects in your local area? Come help us and take part in one of the many activities that we organise
body.markdown: Eager to get involved with community projects in your local area? Come help us and take part in one of the many activities that we organise

image.alt: Photo from a litter picking run

body.html:
The Community Living Room at Priory Court Community Centre is a warm and welcoming space where people can relax, play, socialise or simply sit by oneself in comfort. This space is run by William Morris Big Local and funded by Waltham Forest council funding.

The following activities, facilities and support will be on offer:

Comfortable seating in a relaxed space. Tea, coffee, cake, biscuits, fruit.

Quiet solo activities: Books, newspapers, jigsaws, word searches etc.

Creative activities: knitting, sewing, drawing, painting.

Social activities such as board games and cards.

Opening times: Every Monday and Thursday 12pm – 5pm.

Location: Priory Court Community Centre, 11 Priory Court, E17 5NB.
body.markdown:
The Community Living Room at Priory Court Community Centre is a warm and welcoming space where people can relax, play, socialise or simply sit by oneself in comfort. This space is run by William Morris Big Local and funded by Waltham Forest council funding.

The following activities, facilities and support will be on offer:

Comfortable seating in a relaxed space.
Tea, coffee, cake, biscuits, fruit.

Quiet solo activities: Books, newspapers, jigsaws, word searches etc.

Creative activities: knitting, sewing, drawing, painting.

Social activities such as board games and cards.

Opening times: Every Monday and Thursday 12pm – 5pm.

Location: Priory Court Community Centre, 11 Priory Court, E17 5NB.

body.html:
A free weekly youth club for 10-15 year olds taking place every Thursday from 5.30pm to 7.30pm.

Just some of what we get up to:

Football/Basketball

Board Games

Dodgeball

Games consoles

Arts n Crafts

Hanging out

en.headline: Empowering William Morris residents to improve their area

content.html:
Inspired by the community achievements of William Morris Big Local over the last 12 years, as that programme finishes in 2024, we will be here to continue its legacy of positive change.

We are William Morris Community Threads, a community organisation based in the William Morris area of Walthamstow. We bring people together and work alongside you to weave stronger connections in our community.
content.markdown:
Inspired by the community achievements of William Morris Big Local over the last 12 years, as that programme finishes in 2024, we will be here to continue its legacy of positive change.

We are William Morris Community Threads, a community organisation based in the William Morris area of Walthamstow. We bring people together and work alongside you to weave stronger connections in our community.

en.heading: Empowering William Morris residents to improve their area

body.html: Are you a local resident? Do you want to be part of our community and have some time to spare? Volunteer with us, and even become part of the board!
body.markdown: Are you a local resident? Do you want to be part of our community and have some time to spare? Volunteer with us, and even become part of the board!

image.alt: Photo from a previous WMBL event

body.html:
Our regular events:

Community Living Room: Tuesdays & Thursdays, 12-5, PCCC

Youth Club for 10-15yo: every week Thursdays 5:30-7:30 BCA

Christmas Market: TBC in December. Are you a seller? Contact us to secure a stall
body.markdown:
Our regular events:

**Community Living Room**: Tuesdays & Thursdays, 12-5, PCCC

**Youth Club for 10-15yo**: every week Thursdays 5:30-7:30 BCA

**Christmas Market**: TBC in December. Are you a seller? Contact us to secure a stall

content.html:
Join us on our mission

Through awareness, education, and direct action, we're working to combat climate change and protect our precious ecosystems. Together, we can make a difference.

Since our founding, we've been at the forefront of environmental conservation. Our dedicated team of scientists, activists, and volunteers works tirelessly to protect endangered species, restore critical habitats, and educate the public about the urgency of climate action.
content.markdown:
# Join us on our mission

 Through awareness, education, and direct action, we're working to combat climate change and protect our precious ecosystems. Together, we can make a difference.

Since our founding, we've been at the forefront of environmental conservation. Our dedicated team of scientists, activists, and volunteers works tirelessly to protect endangered species, restore critical habitats, and educate the public about the urgency of climate action.

quote.html: "To be without trees would, in the most literal way, to be without our roots."
quote.markdown: "To be without trees would, in the most literal way, to be without our roots."

body.html: We are a beacon of commitment towards preserving our forests. In the embrace of nature, we stand steadfast, advocating for the voiceless sentinels of our ecosystem. Together, we forge a path towards a greener tomorrow.
body.markdown: We are a beacon of commitment towards preserving our forests. In the embrace of nature, we stand steadfast, advocating for the voiceless sentinels of our ecosystem. Together, we forge a path towards a greener tomorrow.

body.html: Eager to leave a green footprint? Lend your hands to Lorem Ipsum Dolor. Each seed you sow, every forest you help clean, and every conversation you initiate about the importance of trees, echoes in our mission. Every action matters!
